noexist_uname: Der username kann nicht nichts sein.
noexist_pw1: The password field cannot be empty!
noexist_p2: The password again field cannot be empty!
noexist_age: The age field cannot be empty!
noexist_clr: The color selector cannot be empty!
noexist_movies: The movies checkboxes cannot be all empty!
uname_short: The username should be atleast 5 characters long.
uname_complex: The username should only contain a-z A-Z 0-9 characters!
pwd_short: The password should be atleast 8 characters long!
pwd_long: The password should be atmost 30 characters long!
pwd_complex: The password should contain atleast one lowercase, uppercase letter, one number and one special character (# @ $ %)!
age_nan: The age is not a number!
age_bad: Your age should be between 18 and 200!
movie_bad: One of the movies is incorrect!
